p: The capsules were ground, and the essential oil was extracted using a Clevenger apparatus. For 3 h, 100 g of each sample powder was extracted, and the percentage yield was calculated after repeating the process thrice. The extracted essential oils were dried over anhydrous Na 2SO 4, transferred to an amber-coloured tight vial, labelled as EC-I or EC-G, and stored at 4 Â°C for further analysis.
